document.full_text: libyan leader muammar gaddafi survived a nato airstrike on saturday night that killed his youngest son saif al-arab and three of his grandchildren, a libyan government spokesman said.
document.title: libyan leader's son saif al-arab killed in nato strike
lines_and_colors: libyan leader muammar gaddafi survived a nato airstrike on saturday night that killed his youngest son saif al-arab and three of his grandchildren, a libyan government spokesman said.
